name: 1space
description:
Based on 0space by Teknopants, 1space is a zero-gravity, multiplayer, space combat game. Shoot, knife, and bomb your way to the top of the scoreboard in this interstellar deathmatch! Walk on walls, or simply drift through three dimensional space as you line up the perfect shot. 1space supports 2-4 players on a single computer, and is compatible with all common controllers on Windows and Mac.

Note: 1space requires 1 to 4 controllers to play
